amendment.description: Amendment to the Smith (OR) amendment (A003) prohibits road construction in forests if doing so would violate any law or policy in effect or proposed by the date of enactment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Smith (OR) amendment to specify that roads shall not be constructed in forests where prohibited by existing or proposed Federal policy.

action.text: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Boehlert to the Smith (OR) amendment (A003).
On agreeing to the Boehlert amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 200 - 187 (Roll No. 79).
